comments.text:
Excellent spot for getting 3.34km-long rides in a circle.
http://hitchwiki.org/en/Monaco
Decided to try hitchhiking in Mpnaco for fun, turns out it works haha, got a ride when it was already dark to Menton

Good place to go to Nice
There is a gas station next to the roundabout so everybody goes really slowly. I hitched a car in 3 minutes
After spending the night with our tent in the gas station, the nest morning we(boy and girl) hitchhiked to Verona but we found a ride in 30min to Torino.
there is little traffic, since it's a small one and when i was there it was just families that can't take you.
